from collections import Counter
import sys

def letter_frequency_analyzer():
    lines = [line.rstrip('\n') for line in sys.stdin]
    for line in lines[:-1]:
        counts = Counter(line)
        max_freq = max(counts.values())
        max_letters = [k for k, v in counts.items() if v == max_freq]
        max_letters.sort()
        print(' '.join(max_letters))

letter_frequency_analyzer()
